subject: everyone please listen to this file from the 470
author: bhali333
full_text:
I recieved this communication during a rs 470 session and heard it real 
time and believed it was meant for everyone.

please give it a listen, it is a bit rough it was a long message for 
them to get through in one shot but I know it is important.

please reply I want your thoughts.
the message says

"is there any special that wishes to communicate_JUST MIKE_THIS IS OUR 
GIFT TO EARTH BRUCE_yes I'm listening_DON'T LOSE THIS GIFT

Bruce
